summary: I have continuously worked in the EDA (Electronic Design Automation) field. I majored in electrical and electronics engineering and worked at Samsung Electronics for 10 years on projects such as PLM, PDM, DRC, and analysis automation. After that, I founded a company called Pentacube with my colleagues, where we develop and provide software services in the EDA field.

projects.title: Eye Generation and Analysis (CubicWave)
projects.description: Generates Eye from transient analysis results and automatically measures Aperture size. Implemented functions to configure DDR timing results and automatically output reports. In this project, I mainly managed tasks with minimal coding.

projects.title: Ansys EM Analysis Automation
projects.description: Developed analysis automation for Ansys SIWave and HFSS. Worked on creating and modifying .siw files directly to quickly generate analysis files. Also performed automation using scripts provided by Ansys. Additionally, I played the role of PM in automating various processes of analysis automation.

projects.title: PKG Structural Analysis Automation
projects.description: Served as the PM for an Ansys-based structural analysis automation system. Provides an I/F for DIE structures within PKG, generates analysis input files, and outputs reports.

projects.title: DRC/DFM (CubicPDRC)
projects.description: Developed DRC. Created the initial structure and UI, and continuously developed and maintained features over a long period. I understand the characteristics of CAD data and the limitations of applying DRC in various situations. I believe I have the most experience in developing and applying DRC domestically.

projects.title: PCB/PKG CAD Viewer (CubicViewer)
projects.description: A WPF-based circuit CAD viewer. Users can load various PCB/PKG CAD files to view and analyze schematics. I developed and maintained features over a long period, implementing UI, ODB++ I/F, and rendering functions using OpenGL.

projects.title: PCB/PKG Comparison Tool (CubicCompare)
projects.description: Developed a function that compares two design data for PCB/PKG.

projects.title: Enterprise Circuit Development Verification Environment
projects.description: Participated in developing a system that commissions DRC and analysis to a supercomputer and stores the history. Maintained the system over a long period after development.

projects.title: DRC
projects.description: Developed the DRC in-house tool used by various divisions of Samsung Electronics. Initially worked on independent product development and later maintained the product using Cadence's Skill.

projects.title: Drawing Comparison Tool Development
projects.description: Developed a tool to compare two drawings and identify version differences. Used to check whether to perform analysis and checklist verification when PCB revisions occur.

projects.title: PCB CAD Viewer
projects.description: PCB CAD Viewer was used as a basis for PCB design cost estimation and DRC. It was developed over a long period by several people, with me handling a significant portion. Proposed and implemented OpenGL technology. Developed and maintained I/F for various CAD files such as Cadence, Zuken, and Expedition.

projects.title: Circuit Development Environment Construction
projects.description: Participated in planning the circuit development environment system within PLM (PDM). As the field representative for the SI project, I was responsible for planning the circuit part. Analyzed circuit development processes and reflected them in the system.

projects.title: Enterprise PCB Design Partner Management
projects.description: Worked as a sub-responsible person in establishing company-wide PCB design partner management standards and applying integrated design costs.

projects.title: IR-Drop Analysis Automation
projects.description: Automated IR-Drop analysis based on Cadence.

projects.title: Optimal Decap Design Automation
projects.description: Developed a system that automates Cadence (formerly Sigrity) analysis tools, performs analysis on a server, and checks analysis results on the web.

projects.title: Design Data Management System
projects.description: Developed some functions of the cad design data management system as a junior employee. It included functionality to check in/out CAD files from Mentor and Zuken. There were various utility functions related to cad design.

projects.title: PCB Design Cost Estimation Tool
projects.description: Maintained a tool that was initially developed. It estimates PCB design costs using various PCB parameters. Used by suppliers delivering to Samsung Electronics. Continued maintenance throughout the tenure.
